definitions.definition: Any material engineered to have a property that is rarely observed in naturally occurring materials; especially:

subdefinitions.definition: Any material that obtains its electromagnetic properties from its structure rather than from its chemical composition ; especially a material engineered to have features of a size less than that of the wavelength of a class of electromagnetic radiation .

main_definition: ( engineering , physics ) Any material engineered to have a property that is rarely observed in naturally occurring materials; especially:
